snippet: Iraq’s Electricity Ministry, which is is making only halting progress in solving the country’s power woes, has put an image of Katie Couric on billboards as part of a public relations campaign.
abstract: Baghdad Journal; Iraq’s Electricity Ministry, which is is making only halting progress in solving the country’s power woes, has put an image of Katie Couric on billboards as part of a public relations campaign.
lead_paragraph: Iraq’s Electricity Ministry, which is is making only halting progress in solving the country’s power woes, has put an image of Katie Couric on billboards as part of a public relations campaign.

headline.seo: Iraq’s Electricity Ministry Puts Katie Couric on Billboards
headline.main: Putting a Megawatt Smile on a Simmering Problem
